data: {"concept_id": "suspense_core", "concept_name": "Suspense (Part 1)", "set": "Narrative", "type": "element", "definition": "Weaponized uncertainty that stretches a charged question by managing knowledge gaps and release timing.", "axes": "question_type|knowledge_gap|intensity|release_timing", "axis_values": "truth|threat|love|identity|outcome | reader_gt_character|character_gt_reader|even | low|mid|high | early|mid|late", "source_file": "Suspense Part 1.md", "source_md5": "52f8616a9f8ebaaa139a7e9f568fa0a3", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:59:14.515094Z"}
